title: Barred Desires
description: Luca Gray HartI have everything I could ever want - a great family, awesome friends, a girlfriend, and I’m headed off to my dream college. But the past is always there, lurking like a shadow in the night…Branson Joseph AdlerI love men. I love everything about them. Their feel. Their smell. Their taste. It’s no secret to my friends and family that I’m gay. But I do have one secret…What happens when you give in to the temptation and your world turns upside down?It’s forbidden.But it’s ours.*Barred Desires is the first book in The Deepest Desires interconnected series. It is a forbidden MM stepbrother romance, and it is angsty, emotional, and steamy.
author: Ashley      James
